product_name: Rock Climbs of Southwest Utah and the Arizona Strip
long_description: Gear up to take on the routes around St. George, Utah, with this detailed and well-illustrated climbing guide. Author: Todd Goss. Softcover; 320 pages; color photos and maps. Sharp End Publishing; copyright 2006. Color-coded sections present climbs in each geographical grouping around St. George. Section overview, detail and individual climb maps help orient you to the targeted climb; illustrated photographs chart your route up the wall. Guide provides all essential information and then some: season, access, length, difficulty and surrounding points of interest. Awesome photos and inspirational quotes get you primed to climb.
short_description: Gear up to take on the routes around St. George, Utah, with this detailed and well-illustrated climbing guide.
